text: The Elizabeth Braves were an American basketball team based in Elizabeth, New Jersey that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team moved to Hartford to become the Hartford Hurricanes during the 1947/48 season on December 19, 1947. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1946/47 |ABL |4th, Southern |Did not qualify |- |1947/48 |ABL |N/A |N/A |} Category:Basketball teams in New Jersey
title: Elizabeth Braves
